price: 55. A-edde yabta yaabay neh bahte nummannaa, hinnnay atu digir kee anqasah yaaba marih numuy iyyam aaxige waa kinnitoo? Kaak iyyen.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
